content.json:
## ðŸ›¡ï¸ Cyren Threat Intelligence Dashboard

**Real-time visibility into Cyren IP Reputation and Malware URLs feeds**

âœ… All queries validated with production data | ðŸ”„ Auto-refresh every 5 minutes

---

content.query:
Cyren_Indicators_CL 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1h) 
| summarize 
    Total=count(), 
    IPRep=countif(source_s contains 'IP'), 
    MalwareURLs=countif(source_s contains 'Malware'), 
    Latest=max(TimeGenerated),
    HoursAgo=datetime_diff('hour', now(), max(TimeGenerated))
| extend Status = case(
    HoursAgo > 7, "ðŸ”´ Critical - No data > 7 hours",
    HoursAgo > 6, "ðŸŸ¡ Warning - Data delayed",
    "ðŸŸ¢ Healthy - Data flowing"
)
| project Status, Total, IPRep, MalwareURLs, Latest, HoursAgo
content.title: ðŸ” Data Pipeline Health (Last Hour)

content.query:
Cyren_Indicators_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where isnotempty(ip_s)
| extend Risk = toint(risk_d)
| summarize 
    Count = count(),
    AvgRisk = avg(Risk),
    MaxRisk = max(Risk),
    Categories = make_set(category_s)
  by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: ðŸ“Š IP Reputation Indicators Over Time

content.query:
Cyren_Indicators_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where isnotempty(url_s)
| extend Risk = toint(risk_d)
| summarize 
    Count = count(),
    AvgRisk = avg(Risk),
    MaxRisk = max(Risk)
  by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: ðŸ”— Malware URL Indicators Over Time

content.query:
Cyren_Indicators_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where isnotempty(ip_s)
| extend Risk = toint(risk_d)
| where Risk >= 80
| summarize 
    DetectionCount = count(),
    MaxRisk = max(Risk),
    Categories = make_set(category_s),
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated)
  by IP = ip_s
| order by MaxRisk desc
| take 100
content.title: ðŸš¨ High-Risk IP Indicators (Risk >= 80)

content.query:
Cyren_Indicators_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where isnotempty(url_s)
| extend Risk = toint(risk_d)
| where Risk >= 80
| summarize 
    DetectionCount = count(),
    MaxRisk = max(Risk),
    Categories = make_set(category_s),
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated)
  by URL = url_s, Domain = domain_s
| order by MaxRisk desc
| take 100
content.title: ðŸš¨ High-Risk Malware URLs (Risk >= 80)

content.query:
Cyren_Indicators_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend Category = tostring(category_s)
| where isnotempty(Category)
| summarize Count = count() by Category
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: ðŸ“ˆ Top Threat Categories
